1: To be happy with a man, you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman, you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.

2: I asked my wife what she wanted for Christmas. She told me "Nothing would make her happier than a diamond necklace" So I bought her nothing.

3: My wife likes it when I blow air on her when she's hot, but honestly... I'm not a fan.

4: If 4 out of 5 people SUFFER from diarrhea... does that mean that one enjoys it?

5: My boss told me to have a good day. So I went home.

6: Never ask a woman who is eating ice cream straight from the carton how she's doing.

7: If you had friends like mine, you'd be the luckiest guy in the world!

8: I don't suffer from insanity. I enjoy every minute of it.

9: There's nothing like the joy on a kid's face when he first sees the PlayStation box containing the socks I got him for Christmas.

10: When I see ads on TV with smiling, happy housewives using a new cleaning product, the only thing I want to buy are the meds they must be on.
